name: AVForums.com - Variable Width
description:
Please note this does not work with the 2013 new site design, for all AVForums style changes please see here:
http://userstyles.org/users/237828

-----

AVForums.com Variable Width style: this provides users with the option to view AVForums with variable width as used to be offered by the site but is no longer supported.

04/04/2012: Updated to work with new style changes.
